definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: Catholics pray to Mary as an intercessor.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒向瑪利亞祈禱，並把她看作仲裁者。

sentences.english: Catholics are agnostic to the Protestant creeds.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒對於新教教義來說，是不可知論者。

sentences.english: But some Chinese Catholics still shun it and, risking punishment, worship “underground”.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，很多中國天主教徒仍冒險參加地下教會。

sentences.english: And just 10% of these 51% people go to church.
sentences.chinese: 並且這51%的天主教徒中只有一成去教堂。

sentences.english: Who does the devoutly Catholic Susan Boyle thank first in her liner notes?
sentences.chinese: 那麼虔誠的天主教徒蘇珊大媽會首先感謝誰呢？

sentences.english: She is a good Catholic and goes to confession regularly.
sentences.chinese: 她是個虔誠的天主教徒，按時作告罪。

sentences.english: The byproduct of history is the confrontation between Protestant and Catholic.
sentences.chinese: 北愛爾蘭新教與天主教徒的對抗是歷史的延續。

sentences.english: If elected, Biden would be the first Catholic vice president.
sentences.chinese: 如果當選，拜登將成爲首位天主教徒副總統。

sentences.english: The living conditions are hard and villagers are sincere Christains.
sentences.chinese: 生存條件艱苦，但村民們都是虔誠的天主教徒。

sentences.english: But first, you have to be single and you must be Catholic.
sentences.chinese: 但首先你必須是單身的且你必須是天主教徒。
欣德勒夫婦是天主教徒。

sentences.english: It has caused a lot of misunderstanding among Catholics who absorbed it in their youth.
sentences.chinese: 它使很多在青年時期接受它的天主教徒產生許多誤解。
她是一個虔誠的天主教徒。

sentences.english: It is partly Catholic and mostly Ukrainian-speaking.
sentences.chinese: 該地區的人民部分爲天主教徒，大部分則講烏克蘭語。

sentences.english: What disappoints me most is that the five conservative justices are all soi-disant Catholics.
sentences.chinese: 讓我最心寒的是五個保守派大法官都自稱天主教徒。

definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
